Posts.Content: On 3/10/2007 Ladyrumpers wrote: To all bosem buddies on Arimidex or other Aromatase Inhibitors...              I am quite new to this forum, and really tune in quite regularly. I have been reading, that some ladies, have been having a rest from taking Aromatase tablets for one reason or another .I wonder just how common this is?  I have completed 5yrs 3 tam., 2yrs arimidex. I was told last year at my annual check just to stay on until my next appt., July 07  might be put on Femera,patient friend 6mths ahead in treatment told me . How I would love a break from my sweats. should I get in touch with my clinical nurse?    interested in your opinions?      Ladyrumpers. hi have you come off drugs Ive been on tamoxifen 3.6 yrs 1yr ariidex 1yr femera thought id be off them now they have told me to go back on tamoxifen why are we on drugs so long?do you know please?
Posts.Title: A Rest from Aromatase Inhibitors?
